requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 processor, an Intel i3 7th generation or higher, or an Intel i5 5th generation or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: In future Update we will enable VR (END 2024 - EARLY 2025)
  • Additional Notes: Please note that with the minimum system requirements, the game is expected to run at a maximum of 30 FPS. The game leverages Nanite and Lumen technologies to deliver an exceptionally high-quality visual experience. Not recomended to be hosting a game with minimum specs (but it can).
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 9th generation, or an Intel i7 7th generation or higher.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: In future Update we will enable VR (END 2024 - EARLY 2025)
  • Additional Notes: For smooth frame rates and cinematic visuals, you may require hardware that exceeds the recommended specifications.
